data.title: Chris Brown and Rihanna are working on a duet
data.meta_description: Chris Brown and Rihanna are working on a duet that Brown, who has been charged with assaulting her, is hoping to include on his new album. “They’ve been working on it together,” a source told E! News. Record producer Polow Da Don has been working with the embattled young couple in a Santa Monica, Calif., […]
data.text:
Chris Brown and Rihanna are working on a duet that Brown, who has been charged with assaulting her, is hoping to include on his new album. “They’ve been working on it together,” a source told E! News. Record producer Polow Da Don has been working with the embattled young couple in a Santa Monica, Calif., recording studio for the past few days. “You have to remember, she’s a kid still . . . So with anybody who goes through something in the world, you have to bring yourself out of it. I guess her refuge is music,” producer Adonis Shropshire said.

Originally Published: March 11, 2009 at 12:00 a.m.
